name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

primaryType.name: Grass
primaryType.description: Plants and nature-based Pokémon. Strong against Water, Ground, and Rock.

name: Charmander
description: The flame on its tail indicates Charmander's life force. If it is healthy, the flame burns brightly.

primaryType.name: Fire
primaryType.description: Fire-based Pokémon. Strong against Grass, Ice, Bug, and Steel.

name: Squirtle
description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It hides in its shell when threatened.

primaryType.name: Water
primaryType.description: Water-based Pokémon. Strong against Fire, Ground, and Rock.

name: Pikachu
description: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have a cheek sac that's extra soft and elastic.

primaryType.name: Electric
primaryType.description: Electricity-based Pokémon. Strong against Water and Flying.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt to any environment.

name: Mewtwo
description: Its DNA is almost the same as Mew's. However, it has undergone mutation.

primaryType.name: Psychic
primaryType.description: Mind-based Pokémon. Strong against Fighting and Poison.

name: Rayquaza
description: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

primaryType.name: Dragon
primaryType.description: Ancient and powerful Pokémon. Strong against Dragon.

name: Greninja
description: It creates a veil of water around itself that hides it from enemies.

primaryType.name: Water
primaryType.description: Water-based Pokémon. Strong against Fire, Ground, and Rock.

name: Melmetal
description: It can harden its body by absorbing electricity and other metals.

primaryType.name: Steel
primaryType.description: Metal-based Pokémon. Strong against Ice, Rock, and Fairy.

name: Walking Wake
description: A mysterious creature that resembles an ancient Pokémon.

primaryType.name: Dragon
primaryType.description: Ancient and powerful Pokémon. Strong against Dragon.
